sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form :model="ruleForm" :rules="rules" ref="ruleForm" label-width="100px" class="wrap">
  <el-form-item label="Username" prop="username">
    <el-input v-model="ruleForm.username"></el-input>
  </el-form-item>
  <el-form-item label="Password" prop="password">
    <el-input type="password" v-model="ruleForm.password"></el-input>
  </el-form-item>
  <el-form-item>
    <el-button type="primary" @click="submitForm('ruleForm')">Sign In</el-button>
    <el-button @click="resetForm('ruleForm')">Reset</el-button>
  </el-form-item>
</el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Login',
    data() {
      return {
        ruleForm: {
          username: '',
          password: ''
        },
        rules: {
          username: [
            { required: true, message: 'Please enter your username', trigger: 'blur' }
          ],
          password: [
            { required: true, message: 'Please enter your password', trigger: 'blur' }
          ]
        }
      };
    },
    methods: {
      submitForm(formName) {
        this.$refs[formName].validate((valid) => {
          if (valid) {
            alert('submit!');
          } else {
            console.log('error submit!!');
            return false;
          }
        });
      },
      resetForm(formName) {
        this.$refs[formName].resetFields();
      }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
    .wrap {
        position: absolute;
        top: 40%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        background-color:rgb(151, 137, 142);
        padding: 5%;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 5px;
        color: white;

      }
      .form {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        width: 320px;
      }

      .wrapper {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        font-size: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        
      }

      input {
        padding: 7px 15px;
      }

      a {
        font-size: 16px;
        color: bisque;
      }

      button {
        padding: 8px;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 5px;
        color: white;
        background-color: rgb(224, 55, 196);
        font-size:15pt;
      }
</style>
